channel.description: Recent content in children on Real Charitable Trust

item.title: Children Development Projects
item.description: Every child has the right to good education and health. The future of a nation mainly depends on the Gross National Happiness which is proportionate to the growth and development of children. Real Charitable Trust focusses on nurturing the personal and social life of children. The goal is to provide equal rights to every child without any social, economic and religious differences. RCT served more than 1500 children in and around the slums of Chennai.
